content: **crocheted alpaca or llama christmas decoration the piece is worked in drops lima theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no li-116 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** the piece measures approx 14 cm in height **materials** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 0100 off white or 50 g colour 9010 light grey and use left-overs of the following colours for the face and blanket 5610 brown 7219 pistachio 6273 cerise 5820 ruby red or 4377 dark purple 2923 goldenrod 9018 sea green or 6235 grey blue 1 finished alpaca weighs approx 18 g **crochet gauge ** 20 double crochets in width and 20 row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches in 10 cm change to a larger size if you get too few stitches in 10 cm change to a smaller size
